remarks: Convert an upper real quantifier to an upper integer quantifier. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-May-2016.)
statement:
rexuz3.1 $e |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) $.
rexuzre $p |- ( M e. ZZ -> ( E. j e. Z A. k e. ( ZZ>= ` j ) ph <-> E. j e. RR A. k e. Z ( j <_ k -> ph ) ) ) $.
$d M j k $.
$d Z j k $.
$d j ph $.
